Text.val: 01.10.2009 GB SCR14952 Extended condition of selection CMON and CMOC
01.09.2009 GB SCR14599 Extended condition for Update CMON and CMOC
08.06.2009 GB SCR14669 Extended condition for Update CMON and CMOC
29.04.2009 GB SCR14599 Extended condition for Update CMON and CMOC
21.04.2009 SH SCR14239 Removed update on MQHD
20.04.2007 AK SCR12451 coverted CMON and CMOC update into Direct SQL
//30-05-2005 JP SCR #8383 replaced hardcoded 'flprod' with ini entry
16.12.2003 JJ SCR5078 split count credit/finance limit
30.09.2003 RR -> SCR4448 Changed transaction-level to Client

SQL_STMT_U.val:
UPDATE :1/CMON
SET CMON_NCREDLIMREQPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=3 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NCREDLIMREQRFD= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=4 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NCREDLIMREQRFDPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=2 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NCREDLIMREQINFREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=1 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=3 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQRFD= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=4 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQRFDPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=2 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQINFREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=1 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO ),
CMON_NCREDLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' ),
CMON_NCREDLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' ),
CMON_NFINLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' ),
CMON_NADVLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='A' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' ),
CMON_NADVLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='A' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMON_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMON_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' )
where CMON_YEAR=:2 and CMON_MONTH=:3 and CMON_TOTNDEBTORS > 0 and CMON_CLNTNO <> 99999

UPDATE :1/CMOC
SET CMOC_NCREDLIMREQPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=3 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NCREDLIMREQRFD= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=4 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NCREDLIMREQRFDPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=2 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NCREDLIMREQINFREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=1 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=3 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQRFD= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=4 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQRFDPRELIM= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=2 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQINFREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_REQSTATUS=1 and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and CLCR_COUNTRY=CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NCREDLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NCREDLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='C' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NFINLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='F' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NADVLIMREQ= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='A' and CLCR_URGENT='N' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY ),
CMOC_NADVLIMREQU= ( select count(*) from :1/CLCR where CLCR_TYPE='A' and CLCR_URGENT='Y' and CLCR_ADMNO=CMOC_ADMNO and CLCR_CLNTNO=CMOC_CLNTNO and Substring(CLCR_DATE,1,4) = ':4' and Substring(CLCR_DATE,5,2) = ':5' and CLCR_CLIENTREQ = 'Y' and CLCR_COUNTRY = CMOC_COUNTRY )
where CMOC_YEAR=:2 and CMOC_MONTH=:3 and CMOC_TOTNDEBTORS > 0 and CMOC_CLNTNO <> 99999
update :1/debh set debh_codecreditlimit = 1 where debh_legalowner_debh = 0 and debh_codecreditlimit <> 1
update :1/debh set debh_codecreditlimit = 3 where debh_legalowner_debh = debh_no and debh_codecreditlimit <> 3
update :1/debh set debh_codecreditlimit = 2 where debh_legalowner_debh <> 0 and debh_legalowner_debh <> debh_no and debh_codecreditlimit <>2

update :1/debc set debc_codecreditlimit = (select debh_codecreditlimit from :1/debh where debh_no = debc_debh) where exists (select * from :1/debh where debh_no = debc_debh and debc_codecreditlimit <> debh_codecreditlimit)
